00093 template <class T> class Texture : public ReferenceCounted {
00094 public:
00095         // Texture Interface
00096         virtual T Evaluate(const DifferentialGeometry &) const = 0;
00097         virtual ~Texture() { }
00098 };
00099 // ConstantTexture Declarations
00100 template <class T>
00101 class ConstantTexture : public Texture<T> {
00102 public:
00103         // ConstantTexture Public Methods
00104         ConstantTexture(const T &v) { value = v; }
00105         T Evaluate(const DifferentialGeometry &) const {
00106                 return value;
00107         }
00108 private:
00109         T value;
00110 };
